binrpc
======

HomeMatic xmlrpc_bin:// protocol server and client

Same interface as [patched HomeMatic version of node-xmlrpc](https://github.com/hobbyquaker/node-xmlrpc), for use with CCU1/2, Homegear and CUxD

if used with CUxD make sure CUxD is version 0.66 or higher

## Further reading

* [BIN-RPC protocol description by Sathya, Homegear (English)](https://www.homegear.eu/index.php/Binary_RPC_Reference)
* [BIN-RPC protocol description by leonsio, homematic-forum (German)](http://homematic-forum.de/forum/viewtopic.php?t=8210&p=57493)
